sqlStatement.name: authentication
sqlStatement.statement: SELECT * FROM user WHERE Email = ? AND Password = ?

sqlStatement.name: auctionsSearch
sqlStatement.statement: SELECT * FROM auction, category, auctionCategory WHERE auction.ID = auctionCategory.auction AND category.ID = auctionCategory.category AND Status <> 'END'

sqlStatement.name: auctionOffered
sqlStatement.statement: SELECT * FROM auction, offer WHERE offer.Offerer = ? AND offer.Auction = auction.ID

sqlStatement.name: closingAuction
sqlStatement.statement: SELECT * FROM auction WHERE Status != 'END' AND Conclusion <= ?

sqlStatement.name: auctionOffers
sqlStatement.statement: SELECT offer.ID as OfferID, Price, auction.ID as auctionID, userSeller.ID as IDSeller, userSeller.Credit as SellerCredit, userBuyer.ID as IDBuyer, userBuyer.Credit as userCredit FROM offer, auction, user as userSeller, user as userBuyer WHERE offer.Auction = Auction.ID AND Auction.ID = 1 AND offer.Offerer = userBuyer.ID AND Auction.Seller = userSeller.ID AND Auction.ID = ?

sqlStatement.name: creditUsed
sqlStatement.statement: SELECT Sum(Price) as UsedCredit FROM offer, auction WHERE auction.ID = offer.Auction AND auction.Status = 'ON_GOING' AND Offerer = ?

sqlStatement.name: auctionWon
sqlStatement.statement: SELECT * FROM auction WHERE auction.Winner = ? AND auction.Status = ?
